.

The city is famous for the
Guararapes International Airport.  From Recife, rent a car or take a bus to Brejo da Madre de Deus.  A closer, but much smaller airport, can be found in

value: name=Paixão de Cristo de Nova Jerusalém
content=World's largest open-air theater. Passion of Christ and monumntal city (real-size replica of Jerusalem during Jesus' time). More than 200,000 thousand visitors during Easter.
Historical buildings in the center of town.  Colonial tiles from the 1700s and early 1800s.
Matriz de Nossa Senhora do Bom Conselho Church
Casa da Câmara e Cadeia (1845), by French arhitect Louis Vauthier
Historical and Archeological Museum (Museu Histórico do Brejo da Madre de Deus)
Monumental Sculpture Park (Parque de Esculturas Monumentais Nilo Coelho), in Fazenda Nova district
